data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Teratohyla Taylor (Amphibia: Athesphatanura: Centrolenidae) from north-western Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cisneros-Heredia, Diego F., Yánez-Muñoz, Mario H., Ortega-Andrade, Mauricio (2009): Description of a new species of Teratohyla Taylor (Amphibia: Athesphatanura: Centrolenidae) from north-western Ecuador. Zootaxa 2227: 53-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190232
